WorkItem.ClosedComment: I've already fixed this crash, the work-around for the time being is to switch the model on the empty Rawr start to Warrior first, this sets a variable on the backend before your character loads.
WorkItem.Description:
When trying to load a saved character profile, Rawr will process the three steps, and crash while I assume it is trying to load the gear the character is wearing. Step three finishes, and the character slots remain blank for a moment before the Windows error appears stating "Rawr has encountered an error and needs to close." This also happens when trying to load a character from the File menu.
Â 
This could very well be a bug for any class/race, but I only have a Night Elf Fury Warrior saved.
